content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello Bo Li, thank you for coming to see the apartment in Mannheim. I'm sure you'll find it to your liking. As for the rental price, I'm open to discussing it with you. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am looking for the lowest possible rental price. I am a student, so I want to keep my expenses low. Do you have any suggestions for a rental price that would be reasonable for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim?
name: Bo Li from China

content: Well, I understand that as a student, you're looking for an affordable rental price. Considering the location of the apartment and its size, I would suggest a rental price of €450 per month. This is a reasonable price for a 25 square meter apartment in Mannheim, and it should fit comfortably within your budget. Is that something you would be interested in?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
That sounds reasonable. I agree to the price of €450 per month. Thank you for your help.
TERMINATE.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Thank you for accepting the rental price of €450 per month, Bo Li. I'm glad that it works for you. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. Have a wonderful day!
name: Heinrich Heine
